amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities, Counties, And Other Political Subdivisions
amendatorysection.catchline: Juvenile emergency shelter care; contracts authorized.
amendatorysection.para: Any municipal corporation may contract with any person and provide funds for juvenile emergency shelter care. For purposes of this section:

(1) Juvenile emergency shelter care shall mean temporary twenty-four-hour physical care and supervision in crisis situations and at times when an appropriate foster care resource is not available to persons eighteen years of age or younger; and
(2) Municipal corporation shall be as defined in section 13-309.
